reviewText: Great little short on an incredible luthier building a beautiful instrument and putting it in the hands of one of the most promising talents in the jazz world. The music is great and makes for a perfect solo guitar soundtrack. My only wish is that the building process was more in depth and revealed, and I wish the whole thing was longer! But still a fun short to watch and certainly worth the price. Do yourself a favor and check out both the luthier, Otto D'Ambrosio, and the guitarist, Julian Lage.

5 out of 5:
"Beautiful package, concept and delivery. I've watched this many times and the incredible musicianship of Julian Lage is the perfect balance to the artistry of the luthier".  August 13, 2014
